This is Kendrick Harrison. An Iraq War Veteran and father from Las Vegas. 

His life was turned upside down when he was defrauded by a for profit school. 

He is living proof for why we need to overturn the @BetsyDeVosED Borrower Defense Rule. 

Thank you, Kendrick. pic.twitter.com/SZZeRd0ClL
Thank you @VetsAndPlayers for giving vets a field to play on when they come back from the battlefield. Great event! pic.twitter.com/JL3ZPkMGqz

The House passed my bill to overturn the DeVos 2019 Borrower Defense rule, to give student veterans like Kendrick Harrison the protections they need from shady student loan practices and predatory schools. pic.twitter.com/5jR95ZUnt0

Need help with a federal agency? Have questions about services my office provides? Want to chat with #TeamLee? There’s still time to stop by my team’s mobile office hours at the Sany Valley Senior Center Pancake Breakfast! Come say hi. 🥞 #NV03 pic.twitter.com/gGnQJxhZhB

I’m sensing a trend here….

Thank you @hope4prisoners1 for helping Nevadans reenter our workforce and contribute to our community. Workforce reentry training is good for the individual, good for the community, and good for the country. It’s the smart thing to do and the right thing to do. pic.twitter.com/lTNidNTEOI

Our veterans have the drive to succeed, we just need to help give them the opportunities. Thanks to @VetsInTech for creating those opportunities for veterans looking for job training and careers in the tech industry. I’ve got your back! pic.twitter.com/YVx0dJtL76

The economy is doing well, most Nevadans who want a job can find one, but that doesn’t mean we can’t make improvements.

In the last decade, wages for Nevadans have actually gone DOWN. We can do better than that. Let’s #RaiseTheWage http://bit.ly/30uMycp

This is why I came to Congress. 

We saw a problem making life harder for working Americans, and found the solution to solve that problem with bipartisan support. http://bit.ly/2tsCpka

This is Kendrick Harrison, an Iraq War Veteran & father from Las Vegas. 

His family was evicted & his world turned upside down when he was defrauded by a for-profit school. 

He needs his government to defend him like he defended us. 

As Kendrick asks: “How will you respond?” pic.twitter.com/Q2lrDIrZ1r

The House stepped up today to overturn the DeVos 2019 Borrower Defense, with BIPARTISAN support. 

Thank you to ⁦@SenatorDurbin⁩ for leading this fight with me. Onto the Senate. pic.twitter.com/LMusWBUM8Q
Defend students pic.twitter.com/UhBgEcTZ2M

🎉PASSED🎉 my resolution to overturn @BetsyDeVosED 2019 Borrower Defense Rule passes the House with bipartisan support! 

Thank you to my colleagues. We reminded every American today that education is a national priority.

Today my colleagues in Congress have a choice to make: Stand up for defrauded students or side with predatory for-profit schools.

I think the choice is clear. We need to overturn Betsy DeVos’s 2019 Borrower Defense Rule. pic.twitter.com/u0Imyyjd0B

🚨RIGHT NOW🚨

I am leading debate on the House floor on my resolution, H.J.Res. 76, to overturn the @BetsyDeVosED 2019 Borrower Defense Rule.

It's time to defend students. Watch here⬇️⬇️ https://twitter.com/cspan/status/1217810433601671170 …

🚨TODAY at 11AM EST🚨
@SenatorDurbin and I will be holding a press conference w/my @EdLaborCmte colleagues, students, and advocates after the House votes on my bill to overturn Betsy DeVos's 2019 Borrower Defense Rule. 

Watch the live-stream here⬇️⬇️
 http://bit.ly/371822O

The 2019 Borrower Defense rule makes it almost impossible for students scammed by predatory schools to get loan relief. 

Tomorrow, the House is voting to overturn that rule.

Let's remind the country that education is a national priority.

I can’t think of a more tragic situation than a child without a bed to sleep in. We need to expand comprehensive youth homeless services, and I’m glad we took a step towards that in @EdLaborCmte yesterday. https://twitter.com/EdLaborCmte/status/1217140691924668416 …
Betsy DeVos’s 2019 Borrower Defense Rule is fiscally irresponsible.
Yes we are. https://twitter.com/Newsweek/status/1217165725862744064 …

Veterans are some of the most frequent targets of fraud from predatory, for-profit schools. 

Standing up for our veterans also means giving them a chance to get an education without being cheated by an institution looking to make a quick buck. https://twitter.com/NevadaCurrent/status/1215768315668250624 …
No, thank YOU! There’s no doubt, Women Veterans ROCK! 🤘 https://twitter.com/WomenVetsRock/status/1217505113826217984 …

The 2016 Borrower Defense rule protects taxpayers from being forced to bail out fraudulent, predatory for-profit schools.

The Betsy DeVos 2019 Borrower Defense Rule is fiscally irresponsible. pic.twitter.com/XGnypd1H9U

I’ll make this as clear as I can for @BetsyDeVosED: Borrower Defense loan forgiveness is not free money for students. It’s protection for students who were lied to, scammed, and defrauded by predatory schools. 

Protecting students from fraud is not controversial, it’s our job.

The Pregnant Worker’s Fairness Act is very personal to me. I’m the mother of two children, and have had my own difficulties during pregnancy. 

We need to support pregnant workers. pic.twitter.com/70MA5UtYHa

.@BetsyDeVosED keeps saying that her new Borrower Defense rule saves taxpayer dollars. 

Not only does the new rule leave taxpayers on the hook when predatory schools go under, but the only reason it would “save 💲” is because they're denying relief to every defrauded student🤔 pic.twitter.com/8IuaNikSof

There is no doubt that Betsy DeVos’s 2019 Borrower Defense rule prioritizes enriching predatory for-profit schools over protecting defrauded students and American taxpayers. 

My bill on the floor this week will set our priorities straight. http://bit.ly/2QV8DO5

Thank you, and every attorney general throughout the country, for your support! 

Our states get that students need the resources to fight back when a predatory school cheats them out of an education. It’s time to #defendstudents https://twitter.com/MassAGO/status/1217127631688060928 …

The House passed the Lower Drug Costs Now Act to combat directly rising drug costs. 

Prices will keep going up so long as @senatemajldr refuses to vote on the bill in the Senate. https://reut.rs/30jxsX4
Thanks again to @girlscoutsnv for a great kick-off to cookie season! Save me some thin mints! pic.twitter.com/d0yPg4Z4zo

Thanks to the thousands of southern Nevadans who came out for Law Enforcement Appreciation Day celebration on Saturday! And the biggest thank you to our law enforcement officers themselves for keeping our community safe. We appreciate you. pic.twitter.com/qzipvmhfcP

I join all of my colleagues and #NV03 constituents to celebrate the contributions of Korean Americans to our communities across the country. Thank you for making our nation stronger. #KoreanAmericanDay

FALSE: Betsy DeVos’s new Borrower Defense rule saves taxpayer dollars.

FACT: According to analysis of @usedgov’s OWN DATA, DeVos’s proposed changes will result in institutions repaying only 1% of debt relief for defrauded borrowers. The other 99% will be paid by taxpayers.

Betsy DeVos’ 2019 Borrower Defense rule makes it nearly impossible for defrauded students to get the relief they deserve.

The House is voting on my bill this week to put a stop to it. pic.twitter.com/PGNrx1mv87

I just spoke to @RulesDemocrats in support of my Resolution to overturn the 2019 Borrower Defense Rule. 

The House has a chance this week to stand up for defrauded students and against predatory for-profit schools. Let’s show the country our priorities are in the right place. pic.twitter.com/27MGXCD5K3

When #4profit colleges shut down, families get hurt.

We need comprehensive borrower defense to ensure defrauded students still have a shot for success when their for-profit school screws up. My bill on the floor this week does that. http://bit.ly/35VCZ7z

Let’s take it back a couple years. This headline says it all:

“Trump administration moves to make it harder for defrauded students to erase debt.”

Next week the House is taking a big first step to stopping that. https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/grade-point/wp/2018/07/25/trump-administration-moves-to-make-it-harder-for-defrauded-students-to-erase-debt/ …

‘Burdensome’ is definitely the key word here. Sec. DeVos’ 2019 Borrower Defense rule makes it nearly impossible for defrauded students to get the relief they deserve.

That’s why Congress needs to pass my resolution this week to overturn this harmful rule. https://www.nevadacurrent.com/blog/house-to-vote-on-lees-strike-at-burdensome-devos-debt-relief-rule/ …

I’m here at the #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay celebration at Police Memorial Park! It warms my heart to see thousands of southern Nevadans out supporting our brave law enforcement officers. 

Thank you for keeping our community safe. pic.twitter.com/MjVzo2bwqL

I voted to pass the PFAS Action Act to help stop the flow of PFAS chemicals into the environment. pic.twitter.com/Agwpf50Ced

Great first week of the 2020 session in the House! Next week is going to be big. The House is voting on my resolution to overturn Betsy DeVos’s Borrower Defense rule that is hurting defrauded students. 

This decade we’re going to finally make education a national priority.

Today is #CutYourEnergyCostsDay! Before you leave your home today ask yourself, “Did I turn off all of my lights?”

The Earth thanks you.

The House just passed the PFAS Action Act to require @EPA to:

✅Stem the flow of PFAS contamination into the environment
✅Identify health risk associated with PFAS
✅Limit human exposure to PFAS

Another decade has gone by without meaningful reform to our public school system. Southern Nevada still has the most overcrowded classrooms in the country and our teachers still aren’t paid enough. That needs to change.
The calendar shows 2020 but we need to protect Americans with pre-existing conditions like it’s 2010.
